name: part_007
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ生誕祭2022】Wonder Shower Musical !!!!【3DLIVE】 [TsRo8VuubSk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the musical performance of "Alice in Musicland" featuring Aki Rosenthal, Himemori Luna, and Roboco-san.
Short MC section where the performers talk and prepare for the next solo stage.
Aki Rosenthal performs her solo song "Heroine Audition" on a moving platform.

subtitles.original: いつもこっちからでも
subtitles.english: Even though it's always from my end,

subtitles.original: 勝手ばかり喋っている
subtitles.english: I'm always just talking selfishly.

subtitles.original: 運命は必然じゃなく
subtitles.english: Fate isn't an inevitability,

subtitles.original: 偶然出来ている
subtitles.english: it's made of coincidences.

subtitles.original: いつまで経ってもわかんない
subtitles.english: No matter how much time passes, I don't understand.

subtitles.original: 約束だって破りたい
subtitles.english: I even want to break my promises.

subtitles.original: 誰かを愛す事なんて
subtitles.english: To love someone is

subtitles.original: 唐突とっても困難だ
subtitles.english: abruptly and extremely difficult.

subtitles.original: たしかに君に会いたい
subtitles.english: I certainly want to see you.

subtitles.original: 100年先も側にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be by your side 100 years from now.

subtitles.original: どんなに離ればなれでも
subtitles.english: No matter how far apart we are,

subtitles.original: 二人をつなぐ魔法は JOY!
subtitles.english: the magic that connects us is JOY!

subtitles.original: 死ぬまでドキドキしたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to feel my heart throb until I die.

subtitles.original: 死ぬまでワクワクしたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to be excited until I die.

subtitles.original: 死ぬまでドキドキしたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to feel my heart throb until I die.

subtitles.original: 死ぬまでワクワクしたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to be excited until I die.

subtitles.original: あ、この曲は！
subtitles.english: Oh, this song is!

subtitles.original: あ、準備しなきゃなのら！
subtitles.english: Ah, I have to get ready nanora!

subtitles.original: ほらほら行って行って！
subtitles.english: Come on, go, go!

subtitles.original: 頑張って！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 待っててね！
subtitles.english: Wait for me!

subtitles.original: ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 助けてね！
subtitles.english: Help me out!

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあ今からみんなのところに行くよ！
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm heading over to everyone now!

subtitles.original: 君のヒロインはだーれ？
subtitles.english: Who is your heroine?

subtitles.original: ヒロインオーディション
subtitles.english: Heroine Audition

subtitles.original: 覚えてる 優しい
subtitles.english: I remember your kind

subtitles.original: 君の言葉にギュンとして
subtitles.english: words and they make my heart tighten.

subtitles.original: 上手に言えない
subtitles.english: Instead of saying it well,

subtitles.original: 代わりに笑いかけてみたの
subtitles.english: I tried to smile at you.

subtitles.original: 目が合った気がした それだけで
subtitles.english: I felt like our eyes met, and with just that,

subtitles.original: 鼓動が跳ねた お願い
subtitles.english: my heart jumped. Please,

subtitles.original: 勘違いじゃありませんように
subtitles.english: I hope it's not a misunderstanding.

subtitles.original: そっとパノラマの中で 熱い視線送った
subtitles.english: Quietly within the panorama, I sent a passionate gaze.

subtitles.original: 振り向いててね 目が合っちゃっていた
subtitles.english: Keep looking back, our eyes have met.

subtitles.original: ヒロインオーディション エントリーしたら
subtitles.english: Heroine Audition. If I enter,

subtitles.original: 私を選んでくれるかな？
subtitles.english: will you choose me?

subtitles.original: マジ目だ せっかく
subtitles.english: I'm serious. For once,

subtitles.original: おはようだけで伝わるよ
subtitles.english: just "good morning" gets the message across.

subtitles.original: 何気ない つぶやき
subtitles.english: A casual tweet.

subtitles.original: もしかしてドキドキ期待してる
subtitles.english: Maybe I'm expecting my heart to throb.

subtitles.original: 眩しい 素敵な人ばかりで
subtitles.english: There are only dazzling, wonderful people around,

subtitles.original: 自信もなくて それでも
subtitles.english: and I have no confidence. But even so,

subtitles.original: 本音は
subtitles.english: my true feelings are...

subtitles.original: 365日 もっと近づきたい
subtitles.english: 365 days, I want to get closer.

subtitles.original: 私なりのペースになるけど
subtitles.english: It'll be at my own pace, though.

subtitles.original: ヒロインオーディション 勇気を出したら
subtitles.english: Heroine Audition. If I gather my courage,

subtitles.original: 君はねえ応えてくれるかな？
subtitles.english: hey, will you answer me?

subtitles.original: 出会った一瞬ってかなりすごいミラクル
subtitles.english: The moment we met was quite a great miracle.

subtitles.original: このチャンスは赤い糸
subtitles.english: This chance is the red thread of fate.

subtitles.original: ギュッとたぐり寄せて運命にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's pull it tight and make it destiny.

subtitles.original: 信じて真っ直ぐ背伸びの言葉に
subtitles.english: Believing, straight towards words I've stretched myself to say.
